# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities have no fuel
-  Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a fuel source before operation.
### Errors when entities are not connected
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before operation.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients before operation.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before operation.
### Errors when entities have no source items
-  Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items before operation.

# NAMESPACE
*Important variables:*
-  Entity positions (x, y)
-  Entity statuses (e.g. NO_FUEL, NOT_CONNECTED)
*Utility functions:*
-  None defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
